name: Pulang Kampung
description:
Travel through perilous obstacles, face various dangers, and meet new friends in this fantasy endless runner -roguelike hybrid game based on the traditions of Mudik where you strive to reach back to your ancestral land after living far away. 


Watch your food supplies, fight (or avoid) dark spirits and dangerous foes, encounter various events…

Safe Travels!


The game was made during the Quick Play 2022.
